page.title: 01S.NORMANTON/PINXTON SUMMARY
page.content: This block is in a mixed industrial/ residential/farming area on the Notts./ Derbys.border.It contains the villages of{S.Normanton(Pop:7130) and{Pinxton(Population:4477),}which were originally colliery villages.In the last decade the pits have closed. The{M1 Motorway(J.28)}has had a major influence on the area.Shortly after its opening,the region was designated part of the{Alfreton/Mansfield Growth {Zone.}Since then there has been rapid industrial and residential development and the area features more and more prominently in national media reports. Unemployment in the area is,however, higher than the national average. The area is served by 1 nursery school 4 infant schools,two junior schools and one secondary school(without a sixth form.)
